systems.name: Garage User Interface System
systems.description: System managing tank display, sorting, and customization options in the Garage
systems.mechanics: Players can view, sort, and customize tanks using various UI elements such as bars, icons, and buttons
systems.objectives: Provide an intuitive and efficient way for players to manage their tanks and decorations
interactions: Sorting tanks by ownership, type, and cost
systems.source_note: Flowchart and tables describing Garage UI/UX design

logic_rules.description: Tanks are sorted based on ownership status, type, and cost
logic_rules.trigger: Player enters Garage or interacts with sorting options
logic_rules.effect: Tanks are displayed in order of Owned > Not Owned, Scout > Assault > Heavy > Elemental, Gold > Diamond, Cheap > Expensive
logic_rules.source_note: Tables and surrounding text discussing sorting logic

logic_rules.description: Players must confirm purchases and are alerted if they lack sufficient funds
logic_rules.trigger: Player attempts to purchase a decor item
logic_rules.effect: Confirmation box appears; if funds are insufficient, alert box is displayed
